Class Abilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • Abilities

  • public class Abilities
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that defines abilities. Any changes to current current abilities, should be made in database class

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) double armor_pen
      Ability armor-penetration modifier
      (package private) double base_Damage
      Ability Ability strenght based damage
      (package private) boolean can_be_parried
      Determines if ability can be parried or not
      (package private) int cooldown
      Ability cooldown(how often ability can be used)
      (package private) int cooldown_timer
      Ability cooldown counter(counts how much turns are left, till ability can be used afgain)
      (package private) double critical_strike
      Ability critical strike chance
      (package private) java.lang.String description
      Ability gui description
      Ability_Effect effect
      Ability effect (special effect caused by ability)
      (package private) java.lang.String name
      Ability name
      (package private) double priority
      Ability priority(bigger priority, bigger chance that user will attack first)
      (package private) double stamina_used
      Ability energy cost
      (package private) boolean target
      Ability Ability target (opponent-true or yourself-false)
      (package private) double weapon_damage_mod
      Ability weapon based damage

    • Constructor Detail

      • Abilities

        public Abilities(java.lang.String n,
                 java.lang.String d,
                 int dps,
                 int weap_mod,
                 int arp,
                 int crit,
                 int cd,
                 int stam,
                 boolean t,
                 Ability_Effect ef,
                 double p,
                 boolean pp)
        Parameters:
        n - name
        d - description
        dps - base damage
        weap_mod - weapon damage
        arp - armor penetration chance
        crit - crit chance(default should be 5%)
        cd - cooldown
        stam - stamina cost
        t - target(true - enemy, false - yourself)
        ef - effect (can be null)
        p - "priority"
        pp - "can be parried"
